sentences.en: A light produced by a body heated to luminosity ; incandescence.
sentences.cn: 不是由于 白热 而发出的光;在温度低时发出的光.

sentences.en: Astronomers tacitly assume that stars of the same luminosity and color all have the same mass.
sentences.cn: 天文学家心照不宣地默认,光度和颜色都相同的恒星具有相同的质量.

sentences.en: Cannot maintain luminosity when replacement ink is lighter than deleted ink.
sentences.cn: 当替换墨迹比所删除墨迹淡时,则无法保持发光度.

sentences.en: Catherine could think of nothing of the kind , and Morris's luminosity seemed almost pitiless.
sentences.cn: 凯瑟琳当然一筹莫展, 莫里斯已把问题说得清楚明白到了毫不留情的地步.

sentences.en: For a few years its luminosity flared up to about 10,000 times the present-day luminosity of the Sun.
sentences.cn: 有几年它的亮度一度达到了现在的太阳亮度的一万倍左右。

sentences.en: It makes skin daylong smooth and soft, while enchanting the natural luminosity.
sentences.cn: 柔滑细腻的膏体,如天鹅绒附着在肌肤表面上,给肌肤提供高效的保护和滋润, 使您的肌肤24小时水润光滑,柔软舒爽.

sentences.en: It will the further color and luminosity tweaking easier.
sentences.cn: 那将会使进一步的颜色和亮度调整容易.

sentences.en: Luminosity glows through pale velum walls.
sentences.cn: 耀眼的光芒透射着苍白的幕墙.

sentences.en: Mount Battie without losing its definition would take on a blue luminosity.
sentences.cn: 远处的巴蒂山沉浸在一派蓝茫茫的暮蔼之中,轮廓朦胧.

sentences.en: On a new layer with difference in color according to the luminosity draw another mountains.
sentences.cn: 再建一层,使用不同亮度的颜色创建另一层山脉.

sentences.en: Recent observations vindicate the assumption: a direct velocity - mass correlation is even tighter than the velocity - luminosity correlation.
sentences.cn: 最近的观测证实了这项假设: 速度与质量的直接关系甚至比速度与光度的关系更为紧密.

sentences.en: Specifies the luminosity of the selected custom color.
sentences.cn: 为选中的定制颜色指定明亮度.

sentences.en: The candle is the basic unit of luminosity.
The quasars cannot shine for longer than a few million years with their present luminosity.
sentences.cn: 在几百万年以后,类星体将不可能具有他们今天那样的发光度.

sentences.en: This luminosity has great cohesive force at low temperature and.
sentences.cn: 该发光体在低温下具有较高的内聚力,高温时容易瓦解.

sentences.en: Using EDTA dispart ray luminosity method test cupreous in gold - cupreous - cadmium liquid.
sentences.cn: 采用EDTA分光光度法测定金 - 铜 - 镉镀液中的铜.

words.tran_cn: [光][电子] 亮度；[光] 发光性（等于luminosity）；光明

trans.tran_en: The luminosity of a star or sun is how bright it is
